text: Antonio Gamoneda Lobón (born 30 May 1931) is a Spanish poet. He won the Miguel de Cervantes Prize in 2006. In 1992, Libro del frío (Book of the cold) was published, making him one of the most important poets in Spanish. In 2005, he was award the inaugural European Prize for Literature. In 2006, he was awarded the Reina Sofia Award, and the Cervantes Prize, the highest honor in Spanish literature. ==Other websites== * (cs) about Antonio Gamoneda Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish poets Category:Miguel de Cervantes Prize winners
title: Antonio Gamoneda
